column10: 'Pf in pregnancy is dangerous. Go to the nearest hospital immediately for medical assistance'
'Make sure the patient take 1/2 tablets ACT if he/she can swallow and refer to the nearest hospital immediately for medical assistance. Dont give primaquine to <1 children. '
'Give ACT 6 strip. Do not give primaquine to children under five'
'Give Chloroquine 1⅟2,1⅟2,1. Do not give primaquine to children under five.'
'Give ACT 6 strip. Do not give primaquine to children under five.'
